properties.value: The Amulet of strength is an enchanted ruby amulet. It is frequently used by players to increase their max hit. At level 50 Crafting, players can craft a ruby amulet. With at least 49 Magic, Lvl-3 Enchant can be cast on a ruby amulet to create an amulet of strength. This amulet, along with the amulet of torture, gives the highest strength bonus of any amulet in the game, giving 2 more points than an amulet of fury.

Item ID1725

The Amulet of strength is an enchanted ruby amulet. It is frequently used by players to increase their max hit. At level 50 Crafting, players can craft a ruby amulet. With at least 49 Magic, Lvl-3 Enchant can be cast on a ruby amulet to create an amulet of strength. This amulet, along with the amulet of torture, gives the highest strength bonus of any amulet in the game, giving 2 more points than an amulet of fury.

A trimmed version of the amulet of strength is available from medium clue scrolls.

{{External|rs|rsc=Ruby_Amulet_of_strength}} {{Infobox Item |name = Amulet of strength |image = [[File:Amulet of strength.png]] |release = [[24 May]] [[2001]] |update = New magic system online! |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = Yes |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |options = Wear |destroy = Drop |examine = An enchanted ruby amulet. |value = 2025 |weight = 0.010 |exchange = Yes |id = 1725 }} [[File:Amulet of strength detail.png|left|140px]] The '''Amulet of strength''' is an [[Jewellery#Enchanted jewellery|enchanted]] [[ruby amulet]]. It is frequently used by players to increase their [[max melee hit|max hit]]. At level 50 [[Crafting]], players can craft a ruby amulet. With at least 49 [[Magic]], [[Lvl-3 Enchant]] can be cast on a ruby amulet to create an amulet of strength. This amulet, along with the [[amulet of torture]], gives the highest strength bonus of any amulet in the game, giving 2 more points than an [[amulet of fury]]. A [[strength amulet (t)|trimmed]] version of the amulet of strength is available from [[medium clue scroll]]s. {{Infobox Bonuses |astab = 0 |aslash = 0 |acrush = 0 |amagic = 0 |arange = 0 |dstab = 0 |dslash = 0 |dcrush = 0 |dmagic = 0 |drange = 0 |str = +10 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = 0 |slot = neck |image = [[File:Ruby amulet equipped.png|130px]] |altimage = [[File:Amulet of strength equipped female.png|130px]] }} ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Magic |skill1lvl = 49 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 59 |members = No |ticks = 1 |ticksnote = Manual casting is 3 ticks, auto-casting is 7 ticks |mat1 = Ruby amulet |mat2 = Cosmic rune |mat3 = Fire rune |mat3quantity = 5 |output1 = Amulet of strength }} ==Treasure Trails== {{EmoteClueHeader}} {{EmoteClue|tier=hard|emote=Salute|location=Northern part of the [[Hosidius]] [[mess]], near [[Ewesey]]|item1=amulet of strength|item2=rune halberd|item3=rune platebody}} {{EmoteClueBottom}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Amulet of strength}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Amulet of strength}} ==Changes== ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Amulet of strength detail (beta).png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Amulet of strength detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Amulet of strength (beta).png|center]] |[[File:Amulet of strength.png|center]] |- |RuneScape 2
